Title: Relates to requiring Medicaid to cover a wearable medical device to treat certain forms of cancer
Summary: Requires Medicaid to cover a wearable medical device that uses low-intensity, alternating electric fields delivered to the tumor site to treat glioblastoma and other cancers as recommended by medical and scientific evidence.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring Medicaid to cover a wearable medical device to treat certain forms of cancer
